title: Tutorial: Ingesting Telemetry from Cloud-Based External Sources

metadata.summary: Ingest logs and telemetry from external cloud sources using pre-built adapters or custom webhook configurations.
metadata.primary_use_case: Connect cloud-based security and logging platforms to LimaCharlie for centralized telemetry collection

cross_refs.description: Webhook adapters are one specific approach to cloud-based ingestion alongside pre-configured cloud sensors
Canarytokens is a specific cloud-based external source that uses the ingestion patterns described here
